title: Preservation of old transition provision
context: ยง490:11-102 Preservation of old transition provision. The provisions of chapter 490, effective on January 1, 1967, herein referred to as &ldquo;old U.C.C.&rdquo; shall continue to apply to the amendments herein provided herein referred to as &ldquo;new U.C.C.&rdquo; and for this purpose the old U.C.C. and new U.C.C. shall be considered one continuous statute. [L 1978, c 155, pt of ยง1(34)]
